casebody.data:
Allen B. MINIX, et al.
v.
CITY OF RAYNE, et al. No. 2018-C-0722 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 15, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF ACADIA Writ denied. GUIDRY, J., would grant.

CLARK, J., would grant.

CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons.

In this case involving a fall on a sidewalk, for the thorough reasons assigned by Judge Amy's dissent, I would grant the writ application of City of Rayne thereby reinstating the trial court's dismissal of plaintiff's claim.
